General.Name: BBB Foods Inc.
General.Description: BBB Foods Inc., through its subsidiaries, operates a chain of grocery retail stores in Mexico. The company offers spot products comprising food and non-food products such as clothing, electronics, household goods, and others. It also provides branded and private label products. The company serves low-to-middle income households. BBB Foods Inc. was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Mexico City, Mexico.
General.Address: Av. Presidente Masaryk 8, Mexico City, DF, Mexico, 11560
